name: AQUAPRIM INSULATION
description: AQUAPRIM INSULATION is a Insulating primer and primer based on synthetic resin in aqueous phase. Which is Isolates stains and halos of nicotine, soot, ink and glue, Blocks wood tannins, Isolates graffiti, Good adhesion on any closed background. Does not tint and must not be mixed with other products. Do not dilute on a stained or tanned background. Indoors and outdoors on concrete, cement and hydraulic coatings, glass, earthenware, sanded melamine, aluminum, stripped galvanized steel, stripped zinc, electrogalvanized, stainless steel, bare or coated with old adherent paints and varnishes in good condition. On plasterboard with cardboard skins, copper, wood and derivatives, exclusively indoors.
